title: Nawaz Sharif’s secret meetings with enemies exposes his real face: Shahbaz Gill
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP):Spokesperson and Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on political communication, Dr Shahbaz Gill on Sunday said the three secret meetings of Nawaz Sharif with enemies of the country in a week has exposed his real face.
The meeting with Mohib Hamdullah was planned off-camera as an Indian personality was also present in the first part of the meeting, Shahbaz Gill tweeted.
نواز شریف پچھلے 1 ہفتے میں پاکستان کے 3دشمنوں سے خفیہ طور پر ملے ہیں۔الحمد محب سے ملاقات بھی آف کیمرا ہی پلان کی گئی تھی کیوں کہ ملاقات کے پہلے حصہ میں ایک ہندوستانی شخصیت بھی موجود تھی۔اس شخصیت کے جانے کے بعد چند تصاویر لی گئیں۔محب بہت شودا ہے۔تصویریں بنوانے اور لگوانے کا شوقین
— Dr. Shahbaz GiLL (@SHABAZGIL) July 25, 2021
After the departure of Indian personality, some pictures were taken as Mohib Hamdullah was eager to make and get published the pictures, he said.
Mohib by getting published the pictures and news, exposed Nawaz Sharif, Gill said.
ان3 ملاقاتوں میں سے سب سے خفیہ ملاقات 1 ہندوستانی سرکاری عہدےدار سے لندن کے علاقے چیلسی میں,Chelsea old town hall کے قریب ایک مہنگے ریستوران میں ہوئی۔جہاں پر  truffle arancini نوش کی
ہندوستان اور پاکستان دشمن عناصر سے ملاقات میں پاکستان کے خلاف سازش کا حساب اب ضرور لیا جائے گا pic.twitter.com/fOUqJfr3bS
After this episode, no one would vote for Nawaz Sharif in Kashmir or in any part
of Pakistan, he said and added that Nawaz Sharif who was trying to get National Reconciliation Ordinance, had made an unforgivable mistake.
The most secret meeting of the three took place with an Indian government official at
an restaurant near Chelsea old town hall in Chelsea area of London, Shahbaz informed.
Nawaz Sharif would have to give account of the conspiracy against Pakistan
to masses, Shahbaz Gill added.
